about_the_game:
Help Saga in her quest for revenge. A Viking girl who has lost everything to evil will embark on an epic journey to find answers and end the hordes of enemies ravaging her land.

With great graphics, soundtrack and FX, Saga is a 2D platformer that will take you back to your gaming days on the Mega Drive or Master System in the 90s.

Game features:

A small story that will hook you from the beginning.
10 levels with a map where you can select the path you choose.
10 tunes from the 80's, one per level.
11 Final Bosses completely different and worthy adversaries of Saga.
Lots of different enemies to face.
Lots of combat!

Technical details:

16:9 screen to remember the old days.
16 color palette.
Pixel perfect scaling.
CRT filter.
